item.description:
@system wrote:

For Commands Its

(Admins Only)", 8153); sendQuest("@gre@::party - Party Petes Party Room!", 8154); sendQuest("@gre@::fpits - The Fight Pits , Home Of The Tzhaar Monsters!", 8155); sendQuest("@gre@::saveme - Varrock Bank , In Case Of Trouble", 8156); sendQuest("@gre@::mine1 - Start Your Mining Here!", 8157); sendQuest("@gre@::digsite - The Digsite , Herblores Home!", 8158); sendQuest("@gre@::2bil - Gives 2B (Mods Only)", 8159); sendQuest("@gre@::gloves - Loads Of Gloves!", 8160); sendQuest("@gre@::boots - Loads Of Boots!", 8161); sendQuest("@dbl@::capes/::morecapes - Capes Galore", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@::splitbark - Complete Splitbark Armor", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@::ghostly - Full Ghost!", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@::gloves - Loads Of Gloves!", 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@::obsidian - All Obsidian Stuff!!", 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@::runetrim - Both Sets Of Trimmed Rune", 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@::pure - A Pure Armor Set!", 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@::mime/::mimeshow - Mime Random Event And Mime Outfit!", 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@::shoppingmall - Yay Shopping Mall!", 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@::goldguy - Full Gilded And Extras (Mod Only)", 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@::varrock - Straight To Varrock Centre , Lazy Git", 8172); sendQuest("@dbl@::cave/::ancientcave - Two Pking Caves :D", 8173); sendQuest("@dbl@::matrix - Do The Matrix?", 8174); sendQuest("@dbl@::underwater - Underwater Arena", 8175); sendQuest("@dbl@::raisepray - Loads Of Bones =)", 8176); sendQuest("@dbl@::smithbronze-rune - Bars From Bronze - Rune..", 8177); sendQuest("@dbl@::elemental - Bagful Of Elemental Bars", 8178); sendQuest("@dbl@::smithgold/::smithsilver - Silver And Gold Bars Ftw?", 8179); sendQuest("@dbl@::chocbar - Gives Chocolate..!", 8180); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Edit The Lines After @dbl@
Make Sure You Have The Last Letter Touching The"

Not Sure On Pking Areas Sorry

Btw They Are Campkz Commands lol… You Might Not Have Em
